channel.title: Posts on Nhenhophach's Mods Log
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Nhenhophach's Mods Log

item.title: Ps5 Watercooling
item.description: World first watercooling custom loop for Sony PS5. This is just the very first version of watercooled PS5, there will be so many more versions in future.

item.title: ROG x Touliver: SpaceSpeakers Z11 build
item.description: Modding Cafe finish building the SpaceSpeakers Z11 pc system for the acclaimed producer Hoang Touliver. With the sponspor of Asus and Western Digital, this system using hi-end components from Republic of Gamers and WD_Black lines to fit the need of sound processing work for Touliver.

item.title: Inwin-925 Hulkbuster
item.description: INWIN 925 HULKBUSTER THEME PC Build with initial concept of it breaking through the wall inspired by Độ MIXI’s home decoration.

item.title: Inwin D-Frame 2.0 X Bitspower BlackGold
item.description: PC for Photoshop Editor with ASUS ROG MAXIMUS XII EXTREME, Intel I9-10900K, ROG Strix GeForce® RTX 2080 Ti OC, Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro 64GB 3200Mhz, Inwin D-Frame 2.0 Signature, ASUS ProArt LCD, Watercooling: Bitspower, TouchAqua.

item.title: Gigabyte Designare Concept
item.description: Minimature room PC design with exposed CPU’s IHS waterblock design (original concept and final product by Nhenhophach’s team).

item.title: The Tubeless Build - Water path through mainboard
item.description: I designed a PC without using traditional water pipes, and new parts for the CPU I/O Water Block. I hope motherboard manufacturers will provide optional mounting holes for inserting water pipes from the rear of the system in the future. This will make the system more beautiful and elegant.

item.title: ROG-Gas Station
item.description: Inspired by Bennett Pump. One of my customers is the Gas Station owner. He asked me for a PC like the Gas Pump. So I made one. Inspired by Bennett Pump’s products is Pacific eNVy.

item.title: SuperO X-The Starship
item.description: Inspired by MB$F 3 & TIE fighters, which are fictional starfighters in the Star Wars universe. Propelled by Twin Ion Engines, TIE fighters are fast, agile, yet fragile starfighters produced by Sienar Fleet Systems for the Galactic Empire.
